replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content: 无法获取-1022次元，把星系以及一套附属都更新一遍试试

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
楼主配置文件里这个：minecraft\config\ExtraPlanets.cfg
"Mars Space Station=ture"改为false

minecraft\config\MorePlanets.cfg 
“B:Endle MarsSpace Station=ture”改为false
这个配置改了吗
